Package ohos.agp.render.render3d.util

Interface MeshBuilder


  • public interface MeshBuilder
    Mesh builder.

    Utility class for creating 3D mesh resources from raw data. Pass a MeshBuilder object to ResourceManager to create a mesh resource.

    Since:
    3

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  MeshBuilder.Primitive
      Represents the primitive used to build a mesh.
      static class  MeshBuilder.VertexData
      Vertex data for creating meshes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addPrimitive​(MeshBuilder.Primitive primitive)
      Add a primitive and related import info to this mesh.
      void allocate​()
      Allocates memory for this mesh, should be called after all primitives have been added to this mesh and before data is being fed to primitives.
      int getIndexCount​()
      Get index count.
      int getVertexCount​()
      Get vertex count.
      void release​()
      Release this mesh builder.
      void setAabb​(int primitiveIndex, BoundingBox bounds)
      Set Axis-aligned bounding box for a primitive.
      void setIndexData​(int primitiveIndex, ByteBuffer indices)
      Set triangle indices for a primitive.
      void setVertexData​(int primitiveIndex, MeshBuilder.VertexData vertexData)
      Set geometry data for a given primitive.

    • Method Detail

      • allocate

        void allocate​()
        Allocates memory for this mesh, should be called after all primitives have been added to this mesh and before data is being fed to primitives.

      • release

        void release​()
        Release this mesh builder.

      • addPrimitive

        void addPrimitive​(MeshBuilder.Primitive primitive)
        Add a primitive and related import info to this mesh.
        Parameters:
        primitive - Primitive import information that is used to determine memory requirements etc.

      • setVertexData

        void setVertexData​(int primitiveIndex,
                   MeshBuilder.VertexData vertexData)
        Set geometry data for a given primitive.
        Parameters:
        primitiveIndex - Index of the primitive.
        vertexData - Data buffers for creating a mesh.

      • setIndexData

        void setIndexData​(int primitiveIndex,
                  ByteBuffer indices)
        Set triangle indices for a primitive.
        Parameters:
        primitiveIndex - Index of the primitive.
        indices - Index data as byte array (primitive import info defines the format).

      • setAabb

        void setAabb​(int primitiveIndex,
             BoundingBox bounds)
        Set Axis-aligned bounding box for a primitive.
        Parameters:
        primitiveIndex - Index of the primitive.
        bounds - primitive bounds.

      • getVertexCount

        int getVertexCount​()
        Get vertex count.
        Returns:
        total vertex count in this mesh, note that this function should be called after allocate() has been called.

      • getIndexCount

        int getIndexCount​()
        Get index count.
        Returns:
        total index count in this mesh, note that 16bit indices are packed (two per one 32-bit slot) and there might be padding involved.
